    Methods in com.revature.bank with parameters of type Role 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) boolean Service.accountExists​(Role role, java.lang.Integer iAccountNumber)
    The accountExists method reads in all Accounts into an ArrayList, and compares the input account number to each database account number.
    static void MenuFormatter.displayAccountMenu​(Role role, java.util.ArrayList<Account> accounts)
    The displayAccountMenu method displays the user ID, name, and their accounts with numeric menu inputs.
    static Service[] MenuFormatter.displayMainMenu​(Role role)
    The displayMainMenu method displays all of the services available to the current role with numeric menu inputs.
    (package private) java.math.BigDecimal TransferService.makeDeposit​(Role role, java.lang.Integer iAccountNumber, java.math.BigDecimal bdDeposit)
    The makeDeposit method reads in all accounts, gets the accounts associated with the user, and adds funds to the account, and writes the accounts to a file.
    (package private) java.math.BigDecimal TransferService.makeWithdrawal​(Role role, java.lang.Integer iAccountNumber, java.math.BigDecimal bdWithdrawal)
    The makeWithdrawal method reads in all accounts, gets the accounts associated with the user ID, verifies whether the account has enough funds, and removes the funds from the account, then it writes the accounts to a file.
    (package private) java.lang.Integer Service.obtainAccountIndex​(Role role, java.lang.Integer iAccountNumber, java.lang.String fileName)
    The obtainAccountIndex method reads in all accounts, and finds the account with the specified account number.

    The obtainTargetUserAccountNumber method is used to created a menu of accounts belonging to a specific customer.
